SELECT e.ip AS ip, e.community AS community, pi.serial_number AS port_index, pi.id AS port_id FROM lock_port_info pi INNER JOIN lock_equipment e ON e.id = pi.equipment_id WHERE pi.deployment_status = 1 AND pi.lock_status = 1 AND pi.del_flag = 0 AND e.ip != "" and e.active_defense_flag = 1 AND e.community != '' AND e.del_flag = 0

SELECT site.id AS site_id, site.name AS site_name, pi.lock_status, pi.deployment_status, pi.user_code FROM lock_port_info pi INNER JOIN lock_equipment equ ON equ.id = pi.equipment_id AND equ.del_flag = '0' and pi.del_flag = '0' INNER JOIN lock_cabinet cab ON equ.cabinet_id = cab.id AND cab.del_flag = '0' INNER JOIN lock_machine_room room ON room.id = cab.machine_room_id AND room.del_flag = '0' INNER JOIN lock_site site ON site.id = room.site_id AND site.del_flag = '0'
select count(*) from lock_port_info where del_flag = '0' and deployment_status = 1 and lock_status = 1;
